cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.subtitle: This website does not actively use cookies or tracking technologies.

section1.title: 1. No cookie collection
section1.body: I do not collect, analyze, or store cookies on this site. Any cookies that may appear are automatically generated by your browser or hosting provider and are not used by me for tracking or analytics.

section2.title: 2. Third-party content
section2.body: Embedded or external content (like linked media or GitHub embeds) may set their own cookies. Please refer to their individual privacy policies if you interact with them.

section3.title: 3. Updates
section3.body: If cookie usage ever changes, this page will be updated accordingly.
